sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Cisco HW EOX Bulletins TM">dd044e60dbd02010c81a7b82399619f5</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {

	var dao = new Cisco_DAOScript();
	var resultHwBulletins = dao.createReferences(target.hw_eox_id, "hw_id", "hw_id_ref", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_hardware_lifecycle", true);

	var calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_hardware_lifecycle","","hw_id=" + target.hw_eox_id + "");
	target.assets = calculatedFieldValue;
	target.update();
	
	var calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_hardware_lifecycle","device_id","hw_id=" + target.hw_eox_id + "");
	target.devices = calculatedFieldValue;
	target.update();
	

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-26 11:25:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>4ea919982f38a010cab4d5072799b608</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onAfter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights" source="x_caci_cisco_bcs">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_4ea919982f38a010cab4d5072799b608</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-17 07:10:10</sys_updated_on><when>onAfter</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
